description: This file defines the NoteDao class, providing CRUD operations for Note objects in a Flutter app using sqflite. It includes methods for fetching, searching, inserting, updating, and deleting notes in the database.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Provides low-level CRUD operations for Note entities in the database.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes ordered by 'updated_at' in descending order.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches for notes where title or content matches the query string.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and returns the note with its generated ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note. Requires the note to have a non-null ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
